trainings.technique: Reverse De la riva guard and the unstoppable sweep
trainings.pre_training_goals: Focus on the details and create distance when on defense
trainings.general_notes: Remember to dip knees toward the opponent and then lift up. Remember to cross feet at the ankles.

trainings.pre_training_goals: Do whatever it takes not to get pinned
trainings.post_training_goals: Relax a little when getting pinned
trainings.general_notes: After opening closed guard, put left foot on opponent's right hip to lift up and throw the leg above the opponent's head.
